entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Documentation] Frame IsClippedToBounds Property Default Value #16044
  • Crash when using a Flyout page with a footer on Android: Java.Lang.IllegalStateException: The specified child already has a parent. You must call removeView() on the child's parent first. #16043
  • Add support for DynamicResources in behaviors #16042
  • Implement context flyout menu accelerators on MacCatalyst #16041
  • MAUI sdk should default the JsonSerializerIsReflectionEnabledByDefault property to true #16038
  • Building AdHoc iOS in Release does not ask for permissions on device #16034

Closed

  • AbsoluteLayout.SetLayoutBounds() causes all AbsoluteLayout children to be measured and layed out. #6466
    .NET 8
  • InputTransparent with Opacity/IsVisible behaves differently with iOS/Mac vs Windows/Android #15608
    Backlog
  • under iOS, "parent.InputTransparent = false" does not propagate to children as it should #10203
    Backlog
  • [Bug] InputTransparent = false does not work. #14828
    Backlog
  • [iOS] ScrollView as a child item overlaps the brothers placed to the bottom #15966
    Backlog
  • Grid * Row is broken on iOS #15968
    Backlog
  • Disable MenuFlyoutItem #15896
  • FlyoutPage: Detail page is not fitting the screen on iOS Tablets when setting the flyout behavior to Split. #15877
  • FlyoutPage: Scrolling is not working in the Detail page on iOS Tablets when setting the flyout behavior to Split. #15876
  • Maui ios app crash when using bindings for gradientstops #15919
  • Basic stuff must work in maui preview 6 #16036

PullRequests

Created

  • [android] fix memory leak in Window #16045
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16033
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Implement all permutations of InputTransparent and CascadeInputTransparent #14846
    area/layout 🔲

Updated

  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures
  • Start docs for UITesting #15836
    area/testing
  • Include headers/footers in EmptySource count so they show up when ItemsSource is null #15979
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Various fixes for Border on Android #15458
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Fix OnBackButtonPressed on iOS (#8296) #14137
    community ✨
  • Add visual testing support, on top of Appium #14999
    area/testing
  • [iOS] Fix Editor placeholder issues #15883
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label, i/regression
  • Improve the customization of WebView on Android #16032
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Make WinUI FilePicker FutureAccessList more robust #16026
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Windows Device tests for CI #15629
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, area/testing
  • Android: fix dialog button colors in dark mode #15091
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-dialogalert, s/pr-needs-author-input
